Title: The Omega Man
Writer: John William Corrington (screenplay), Joyce Hooper Corrington (screenplay), Richard Matheson (novel)
Actors: Charlton Heston, Anthony Zerbe, Rosalind Cash, Paul Koslo
Plot: Biological war has decimated life on Earth. Los Angeles is a windswept ghost town where Robert Neville tools his convertible through sunlit streets foraging for supplies.
